QuestData.Title: The Final Leg
QuestData.Description: Please, I must get to Glitterfall Basin.$b$bI thought I was being careful. I did not realize I was being hunted until it was too late. Such is the nature of the forest.$b$bI am too close to fall here. The Lady herself invited me to come join her. She said I would be safe.$b$bCan you take me to her?
